title: Good Housekeeping's Good Food for a Healthy Heart (gnv64)

Vegetables, whole grains, lean meats, and fish play a starring role; quick but wholesome breakfast ideas start the day deliciously; and sweet and fruity desserts provide the perfect, satisfying finishing touch. Everything tastes so good, your family will forget it's also good for you!
